Package com.extjs.gxt.ui.client.core

Core utilities.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
CompositeFunction Inteface for functions that can be applied to all the elements of a CompositeElement.
Selectors

Marker interface for classes that can select El elements from a given root element

The method signiture for methods should be El methodName(El element).
TemplateFactory This is a marker interface for template factories.
 

Class Summary
BaseTemplateFactory  
BaseTemplateFactory.Cache  
BaseTemplateFactory.Cache.Key  
BaseTemplateFactory.IterableRange<T extends Number>  
CompositeElement Wraps an list of elements, allowing code to be applied to each element using a CompositeFunction.
DomHelper Utility class for creating elements from HTML fragments.
DomQuery Provides high performance selector/xpath processing.
El Represents an Element in the DOM.
Template Represents an HTML fragment template.
 

Annotation Types Summary
Selectors.Selector Used on Selectors subinterface methods to specity the css selector to use
TemplateFactory.Cache

Used on TemplateFactory subinterface methods identify that the Template should be cached
TemplateFactory.Resource

Used on TemplateFactory subinterface methods to override the template resource.
 

Package com.extjs.gxt.ui.client.core Description

Core utilities.
